tags.name: Authentication
tags.description: This Rest Controller is for Authentication Requests

post.description: This endpoint is used to Validate OTP and Get JWT Access and Refresh Token with captcha validation using JWT token.
This endpoint is used to verify Tehran SSO authorization code and get JWT tokens.
This endpoint is used to Get New Access Token By Refresh Token.
This endpoint is used to Authenticate and Get JWT Access and Refresh Token with captcha validation using JWT token.
This endpoint is used to Authenticate Via OTP.

get.description: This endpoint generates a captcha image with JWT token for login validation.
This endpoint returns the Tehran SSO login URL for frontend to redirect user.

get.summary: Get UP/DOWN status for each service (no details)
Get complete server health information with details
Get complete Actuator information (health, metrics, env, beans)
